languages.text: "Это возмутительное обвинение! Леди Теодора никогда бы не запятнала себя подобной ересью. Покуситься на десятину? Да никогда!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
languages.original_text: "Это возмутительное обвинение! Леди Теодора никогда бы не запятнала себя подобной ересью. Покуситься на десятину? Да никогда!"

traits.locale_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"
"An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

languages.text: «¡Esa acusación es intolerable! Lady Theodora jamás se habría mancillado con una herejía como esa. ¿Robar el sacro diezmo? ¡Nunca!».
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esa acusación es intolerable! Lady Theodora jamás se habría mancillado con una herejía como esa. ¿Robar el sacro diezmo? ¡Nunca!».

languages.text: “何等荒唐的指控！西奥多拉夫人绝对不可能犯下这样的异端暴行。染指神圣的帝国什一税？绝无可能！”
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: “何等荒唐的指控！西奥多拉夫人绝对不可能犯下这样的异端暴行。染指神圣的帝国什一税？绝无可能！”

languages.text: 「無礼な非難だ！レディ・シオドーラは、そのような異端で泥を塗られたことはなかっただろう。神聖なる租税を盗む？一度たりともない！」
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: 「無礼な非難だ！レディ・シオドーラは、そのような異端で泥を塗られたことはなかっただろう。神聖なる租税を盗む？一度たりともない！」

languages.text: "Eine ungeheuerliche Anschuldigung! Lady Theodora hätte sich niemals zu einer solchen Ketzerei herabgelassen. Den heiligen Zehnt stehlen? Niemals!"
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine ungeheuerliche Anschuldigung! Lady Theodora hätte sich niemals zu einer solchen Ketzerei herabgelassen. Den heiligen Zehnt stehlen? Niemals!"

languages.text: « Calomnies ! Dame Théodora ne se serait pas abaissée à une telle hérésie. Jamais elle n'aurait touché à la dîme sacrée ! »
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: « Calomnies ! Dame Théodora ne se serait pas abaissée à une telle hérésie. Jamais elle n'aurait touché à la dîme sacrée ! »

languages.text: "Bu ne çirkin suçlamadır! Leydi Theodora, asla böyle bir kâfirlikle kendini lekelemezdi. Kutsal aşarı çalmak mı? Ne cüret!"
languages.original_text: "An outrageous accusation! Lady Theodora never would have sullied herself with such heresy. Stealing the sacred tithe? Never!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu ne çirkin suçlamadır! Leydi Theodora, asla böyle bir kâfirlikle kendini lekelemezdi. Kutsal aşarı çalmak mı? Ne cüret!"
